document_data.name: ''Scroll of Protection from Genies'
document_data.mainbody: A '''''scroll of protection from genies''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[scroll]] that warded against [[genie]] attacks.
document_data.Powers: This scroll protected the reader against magical and physical attacks from one or more different kinds of genies, preventing them from directly harming the reader and even from magic that involved an area of effect. The scroll also protected the reader's carried equipment. Different variations of these scrolls existed that offered protection against [[dao]], [[efreeti]], [[marid]]s, [[djinn]], and [[tasked genie]]s. Rare versions of these scrolls protected against all geniekind.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Marwan al-Jabal al-Hiyali]], the Grandfather of the [[Everlasting]] in [[Zakhara]], carried a ''scroll of protection from genies''.{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Cardsheets}}
